Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. A Glacier, was it? Gimme a hand with
this, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, let's get to work! I wanna finish this up
today.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Brrr! That's cold. I can hardly feel my hands
now. Still, a fine piece of work, make no
mistake.
<PAGE>
I'll be headin' on home, then.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good job, <MYNAME>. You've got no small
amount of skill. Anyway, I'll catch ya later.
